text: Free Realms was a massively multiplayer online role-playing game. It is set in a fantasy-themed world, named "Sacred Grove". It was made by Sony Online Entertainment for PC, Mac and PlayStation 3. The game was released on 29 April 2009. On March 31, 2014, the game was officially shut down. ==References== Category:2009 video games Category:2014 disestablishments Category:Free-to- play video games Category:MacOS games Category:Massively multiplayer online role-playing games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: Free Realms
